verbs.description: [V: Separating] [ARG1: illegal immigrant families] [ARGM-LOC: at the border] is not unique to the Trump administration , according to DHS Secretary Kirstjen Nielsen .
[ARG1: Separating illegal immigrant families at the border] [V: is] [ARGM-NEG: not] [ARG2: unique to the Trump administration] , [ARGM-ADV: according to DHS Secretary Kirstjen Nielsen] .
Separating illegal immigrant families at the border is not unique to the Trump administration , [V: according] to DHS Secretary Kirstjen Nielsen .
